messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] California's Charter School Law, was Gobbling  Up Ho...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/03/2001 6:27:49 AM !!!First Boot!!!, crma@ix.netcom.com ... We have a county here in Florida here that is doing this now.  That s where
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/03/2001 6:27:49 AM !!!First Boot!!!, crma@...
writes:


> BTW the entire district wanted to turn charter - as in all the schools
> would be charter schools serving different needs of the community. The
> State Board of Education refused to let them do it last school year.
>
>


We have a county here in Florida here that is doing this now. That's where
the cybercharter will start, if it does. Hillsborough County. That's all I
know about that county though.

Nance


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
